LanguageData.VVE_Dinghy.label: Dinghy
LanguageData.VVE_Dinghy.description:
A very basic motorised boat, the Dingy is an incredibly cheap and discrete method of transportation over water. Has a good cargo capacity, however it is likely to get frozen solid in the winter times and moves slowly on rivers. The exposed rear-mounted engine is vulnerable to attacks and the hull plating should not be expected to wither projectile weapons.

Similar to other tier 1 vehicles, this is a gas guzzler and best used for medium distances.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> права x1, Пасажир x5
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
LanguageData.VVE_Dinghy.properties.0.label: Водій Пасажир 1 Пасажир 2 Пасажир 3 Пасажир 4 Пасажир 5 Двигун Ліва бічна панель Права бічна панель
